name: Facepunch Fixer
description: Fixes various problems with the facepunch stylesheet. I'm pretty lazy, so if you notice something you'd like fixed, or have a suggestion on a better way to "fix" something, feel free to PM me. Click this to visit my profile on Facepunch
additional_info:
Features:
  • Profile isn't a complete fucking mess!
  • Automatically resizes large images to match the page width, if they're too big
  • Posts no longer have a scrollbar again, usually
  • Buttons have proper padding
  • Added the release tag back, so older posts that used it aren't broken.
    • Do not use the release tag, even though it's fixed on your side. Other people can't see it.
  • Usertitles are shrunk down considerably, but respects varying sizes of titles, without allowing them to be annoyingly large
  • Tables cannot be larger than the width of the post, usually.
